entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 12:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -16.2°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -23.5°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
